JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: SAP Business Master Data Coordinator – SAP S/4HANA Cloud
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Silhorko-Eurowater A/S is an international supplier of water treatment solutions. We manufacture advanced and sustainable water treatment plants to produce drinking water and water for industrial use - worldwide. Internationally, we engage more than 430 employees and in 2021 we reached a turnover of more than 500 Mio. DKK. We are part of the Grundfos Group and embraces Grundfos’ global ambition to pioneer solutions to the world’s water and climate challenges and improve quality of life for people.

We need a SAP Business Master Data Coordinator to the new SAP S/4HANA team to work closely together with the present SAP Business Master Data Coordinator, the SAP Project Manager, and the SAP Business Owner to implement our ambitious plan.

The purpose of the role is to have the general overview of the total value chain of the company supported by SAP. The role will ensure adherence to agreed processes through a master data lens, meaning that the overall business process owners are responsible for each their processes, but the coordinator is responsible for interfaces and ensuring that obstacles in our flows are efficiently dealt with.

The SAP Business Master Data Coordinator is a part of the operation and will liaise with external SAP consultants e.g., NTT Data.

A special area of responsibility of the role is price management of the company related to standard products, modified products, projects, and rental business.

The biggest transformation project in the history of our company was initiated in mid-2021. We decided to transform the ERP infrastructure in our company from the present situation: 14 different ERP systems in 14 countries with various business processes to conduct the same business: design, production, sale, and service of water treatment solutions to ONE ERP system and ONE business process.

The enterprise resource planning system we decided to implement is SAP S/4HANA Cloud. We are now in the Realize Phase in the mother company with a GO LIVE date September 5, 2022. The daughter companies will implement in 3 waves in 2022 and 2023.

Your tasks

  • Master Data Management. Develop good master data maintenance processes and implement these within the organization. Work with the master data tool IT.MDS (Master Data Simplified) around vendors, customers, and material master data.
  • Price Management. Ensure optimal pricing of all the company’s products. The role includes updating of cost prices as well as setting of sales prices.
  • SAP S/4HANA Cloud Implementation. Support roll-out in 14 countries with data tracking, clean up and migration activities. Support on decision making regarding what to migrate e.g., payment terms, delivery terms, vendor master data, customers, employees etc. in this implementation process.

Your qualifications

  • Solid commercial and business process understanding.
  • Systematic and possess a structured work style.
  • Preferably ERP background with a solid understanding of corporate ERP processes and implementation.
  • Proven record of working with high standards for master data.
  • Preferably experience with master data tool IT.MDS
  • Experience with SAP is an advantage.
  • Fluent in English both verbally and in writing.
  • Strong business understanding in a digital and commercial context: the Business Master Data Coordinator must understand how all parts of the business model work together including processes and operating systems.

Future with professional and personal development opportunities
We offer a versatile job with great personal freedom in an international company in rapid growth, where the tasks are diverse, challenging and will develop you further. The tone in the workplace is casual, and you will have a large network of collaboration partners across our entire organization in Europe.

You will work under good working conditions with flexible hours, possibility to work remotely, health care package, company pension scheme and elective lunch arrangement.

Your place of work is our headquarter in Stilling near Skanderborg. You will be a part of our new SAP S/4HANA team and work closely with the SAP Project Manager and SAP Business Master Data Coordinators.

Additional information
You can read more about our company by visiting www.silhorko.dk (Danish) or www.eurowater.com (English). You are also welcomed to contact Head of Finance Henrik Møller at +45 87 93 83 34.

Your application
Send your application with relevant appendix to hr.dk@eurowater.com

We will close the application process when the right candidate has been found.
